description: Non-Supine RDI at 4% oxygen desaturation  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-supine body position associated with >= 4% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hrop4 + hnrop4 + carop4 + canop4 + oarop4 + oanop4 ) / ( remepop + nremepop )

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Non-Supine RDI at 4% oxygen desaturation
